title: Lo! the long hastening on, soon the morning will dawn

verses.text: Lo! the long hastening on, soon the morning will dawn, When the King shall in glory descend; We expect soon to join all the bright, holy throng, In the kingdom that never shall end.
O Saviour! dear Saviour! O Saviour come! Here we roam and we sigh, and we call over and over, Come and gather the faithful ones.
